title: IncidentVBO-Service
description: A reference to the Service component from the Incident.

ids.description: The set of Identifiers for the VBO or component. These should be used to uniquely identifier instances of the business object or component.

items.description: The identifier of the business object or component. This should be used to identify instances of a business object or component. Where the component is being used to reference another business object then this is the primary key of the target object. Use the attributes @schemeName and @schemeAgencyName to identify type of Identifier.

@scheme-name.description: The name of the identification scheme. The schemeName of the ID

@scheme-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the identification scheme. The schemeAgencyName of the ID

name.description: The name of the instance of a business object or component.

desc.description: A free text description of a business object or component.

type.description: A classification of the business object or component. This identifies the sub-type of the instance of object or component.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Type

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Type

categories.description: The set of classifications for the business object or component.

items.description: A classification applied to the business object or component. More than one classification scheme can be applied using the @listName attribute to identify the type of code list being used. The classification scheme can be used to group instances of the object or component.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Category

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Category

status.description: The lifecycle state of the business object or component. This field is used to track the specific state an instance of an object or component is in.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Status

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Status

service-area.description: The area in which the service resides.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Status

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Status

service-affecting.description: Indicates whether the incident is affecting the service.

indicator-string.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Status

@format.description: The format of the binary content, date time or number (integer | decimal | real). The format of the Indicator String

indicator.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Status
